attributes.review: This app stole my person information. I felt violated. It’s  bulbous, creepy, orange dusted fingers reached into my phone and laid a school bus of a turn right on my screen

attributes.review: its so horrible that it glitches my phone and then it made me hit myself and now my arm fell off it hurts so bad that i had to go walk my fish across the moon and fell off the water while i was writing a letter to my alien friend who has ptsd that makes you go ride the bike on the tree .....very very very terrible app😔 i don’t recommend it to nobody
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: I thought this app was for The Apprentice but there was no show information. What is happening? The app is not functioning like it should. Trump is not very nice in it!

attributes.review: Ik we all love our apps and political figures- don’t get me wrong but this just manages to fail and disappoint me, the hate, racism and sexism I see here hurts me 0/10
